original_title: La vita Ã¨ una cosa meravigliosa
overview: A policeman who spies on the lives of others, an important banker married to a housewife who poses as a noblewoman. A precarious young masseuse and an electrician madly in love. Very different lives that end up intertwining. But also extremely complicated and troubled lives ... Even if, after all, life is a wonderful thing ...
title: Life Is a Wonderful Thing
